ing: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle fruit-flavored wine (such as Arbor MistÂ®)
des: "This is a 'girly drink' made with cheap wine and sherbet, very refreshing, very easy to make, and perfect for all-girl gatherings like bachelorette parties! Any flavor of wine and sherbet can be used."
ins: Place 2 scoops sherbet into each of four 12-ounce glasses. Slowly pour wine over sherbet; stir slightly.
